attributes.action: Stop unconstitional changes to English governance.
attributes.additional_details:
Will the government stop devolving issues of governance of English affairs of state, which are currently being devolved without the consent of the people.

For example:
http://www.bbc.co.uk/news/uk-england-manchester-31615218

No party has sought or obtained a mandate from the people of England about how England should be governed, so changes like this aren't right.
